title: Young woman wearing light colored dress and smock with embroidered leaves on pocket, applying makeup to seated woman wearing dark long sleeved dress with light colored stripe on hem, sleeves, and sides, woman wearing light colored sleeveless dress and fur hat standing in front of two seated young women wearing light colored sleeveless dresses with rolled collars, in interior with flecked linoleum floor and table with mirror and bottles, two men seated in background
